begin insert into itemtable(itemcode, itemname, saleprice, costprice, itemcontent, registday, img1, img2, img3, img4, itemKeyword) values(#{itemCode}, #{itemName}, #{salePrice}, #{costPrice}, #{itemContent}, sysdate, #{img1}, #{img2}, #{img3}, #{img4}, #{itemKeyword});
insert into stocktable(itemcode, col1, col1s, col1m, col1l, col1x, col1f, col2, col2s, col2m, col2l, col2x, col2f, col3, col3s, col3m, col3l, col3x, col3f, col4, col4s, col4m, col4l, col4x, col4f, totqty) values(#{itemCode}, #{col1}, #{col1s}, #{col1m}, #{col1l}, #{col1x}, #{col1f}, #{col2}, #{col2s}, #{col2m}, #{col2l}, #{col2x}, #{col2f}, #{col3}, #{col3s}, #{col3m}, #{col3l}, #{col3x}, #{col3f}, #{col4}, #{col4s}, #{col4m}, #{col4l}, #{col4x}, #{col4f}, #{totQty}); end;
mapper.select: select rownum , tt.* from (select * from itemtable order by registday desc)tt where rownum<9
select itemcode from itemtable order by registday
select itemcode, saleprice,to_char(registday, 'yyyy"."MM"."dd') as registday from itemtable where registday like '%'||#{date }||'%'
SELECT TO_CHAR(TO_DATE('2019.07.01', 'yyyy.mm.dd') + LEVEL - 1, 'yyyy.mm.dd') FROM DUAL CONNECT BY TO_DATE('2019.07.01', 'yyyy.mm.dd') + LEVEL - 1 <= TO_DATE('2019.07.31', 'yyyy.mm.dd')

select aa.saleprice as saleprice ,tt.* from (select registday , sum(saleprice) as saleprice from (select to_char(registday, 'yyyy"."MM"."dd') as registday , sum(saleprice) as saleprice from itemtable group by registday) group by registday)aa, (SELECT TO_CHAR(TO_DATE('2019.07.01', 'yyyy.mm.dd') + LEVEL - 1, 'yyyy.mm.dd') as data FROM DUAL CONNECT BY TO_DATE('2019.07.01', 'yyyy.mm.dd') + LEVEL - 1 <= TO_DATE('2019.07.31', 'yyyy.mm.dd'))tt where tt.data=aa.registday order by 2
